content.rendered:
24th November 2015 – OWC (Aqualis) GmbH (OWC) today signed a contract with Trianel GmbH to provide project management support services on the Phase 2 of the Borkum West II Trianel Windpark Borkum project, which is currently being jointly developed by Trianel and EWE. The contract signing represents a significant milestone in the continual development and expansion of OWC operations and business in Germany and also confirms on-going support which was originally provided by certain key OWC personnel to Trianel on the Phase 1 project. The contract was signed in Hamburg today by Ian D. Bonnon, Managing Director of OWC and Mr Klaus Horstick and Mr Manuel Eck both Manging Directors of of the Offshore Division of Trianel.

For further information on OWC please visit owcltd.co.uk
